title: Rays vs. Red Sox
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for July 11 at 7:10PM ET:
If the Tampa Bay Rays win, the market will resolve to “Rays”.
If the Boston Red Sox win, the market will resolve to “Red Sox”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

title: Highest temperature in London on July 12?
description:
This market will resolve to the temperature range that contains the highest temperature recorded at the London City Airport Station in degrees Fahrenheit on 12 Jul '25.

The resolution source for this market will be information from Wunderground, specifically the highest temperature recorded for all times on this day by the Forecast for the London City Airport Station once information is finalized, available here: https://www.wunderground.com/history/daily/gb/london/EGLC.

This market can not resolve to "Yes" until all data for this date has been finalized.

The resolution source for this market measures temperatures to whole degrees Fahrenheit (eg, 21°F). Thus, this is the level of precision that will be used when resolving the market.

Any revisions to temperatures recorded after data is finalized for this market's timeframe will not be considered for this market's resolution.

title: Ethereum Up or Down on July 12?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 11 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 12 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 11 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 12 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for XRP/USDT 11 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 12 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

title: Will Coinbase's TBA app launch before October?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Coinbase's TBA wallet app is available for installation on the US iOS app store by September 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Pre-Order does not satisfy the market conditions.

The primary resolution source will be the US iOS app store, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

title: MSI Playoffs: Bilibili Gaming vs. Anyone's Legend
description:
Bilibili Gaming and Anyone's Legend are scheduled to play each other in the playoffs of the Mid-Season Invitational on July 10, 2025, at 8:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “Bilibili Gaming” if Bilibili Gaming wins against Anyone's Legend in the best of 5, playoff matchup of the Mid-Season Invitational.

This market will resolve to “Legend” if Anyone's Legend wins against Bilibili Gaming in the best of 5, playoff matchup of the Mid-Season Invitational.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 16, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from LoL Esports (https://lolesports.com/en-GB/tournament/113470835034591734/overview).
